ai-patthana15.46:0.2_0: Living in the teaching, they are included in the discourses and found, as it’s amazing.
ai-patthana15.46:0.3_0: Standing on the bank of the skillful, your partners and children.
ai-patthana15.46:1.1_0: mental phenomena don’t arise dependent on the mind and thoughts.
ai-patthana15.46:1.1_1: ‘... for the sake of the three realms.’ ...
ai-patthana15.46:2.1_0: mental processes arise for the mind, not for the sake of thought that has been unskillful.
ai-patthana15.46:2.1_1: ‘... for the sake of the three realms.’ ...
ai-patthana15.46:2.1_3: (This should be expanded as for the three roots of the following.)
